What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Dual --> new deck
2. Click on edit deck
3. Type "mox" in search
4. hover over any of the card results What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected to see card preview, but the game crashes. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Version 1.29 Please provide any additional information below. CRASH REPORT FOR MAGARENA THREAD Thread[AWT-EventQueue-0,6,main]
CREATED ON 2012/09/07 23:49:30
MAGARENA VERSION 1.29, JRE 1.6.0_33, OS Mac OS X_10.7.4 x86_64

Exception from controller.runGame: null
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at magic.GraphicsUtilities.scale(GraphicsUtilities.java:58)
	at magic.data.HighQualityCardImagesProvider.getImage(HighQualityCardImagesProvider.java:59)
	at magic.ui.viewer.CardViewer.setCard(CardViewer.java:72)
	at magic.ui.CardTable$RowMouseOverListener.mouseMoved(CardTable.java:198)
author: [Kevin.Ro...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110836722264835547840/)
title: Game crash in deck edit mode

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting. This is due to an error in the URL for the images. This has been fixed. See issue 283 for a workaround for 1.29. https://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=283

**Status:** Duplicate  
  **Mergedinto:** 283
